XsUShortVector Struct Reference

A vector containing 3 short values. More...

Public Member Functions

 XsUShortVector ()
 Constructor that creates the vector with all components set to 0.
 
 XsUShortVector (unsigned short v1, unsigned short v2, unsigned short v3)
 Constructor that creates the vector with all components set to given values v1 v2 and v3.
 
 XsUShortVector (const unsigned short *a)
 Constructor that creates the vector with all components set to values in array a.
 
 XsUShortVector (const XsUShortVector &other)
 Constructor that creates the vector and initializes it with data from the other vector.
 
XsUShortVector & operator= (const XsUShortVector &other)
 Assignment operator copies the data from the other vector to this vector.
 
bool operator== (const XsUShortVector &other) const
 Comparison operator, returns true if the contents of the other vector match those of this vector.
 
XsSize size () const
 Return the size of the vector (always 3)
 
unsigned short at (int index) const
 Return a value from the vector (needed to allow generated C# access to these elements)
 
unsigned short operator[] (XsSize index) const
 Returns the index'th item in the vector.
 
unsigned short & operator[] (XsSize index)
 Returns a reference the index'th item in the vector.
 
unsigned short const * data () const
 Returns the start of the internal data buffer.
 

Detailed Description

A vector containing 3 short values.
